author: fern
description:
Check out https://anydesk.com/fern to try it out for free (ad)

Many thanks to all our interview partners for their support in making this video. German speaking viewers can check out the website www.kokainfo.de run by our expert Heike Zurhold for more information on cocaine. Special thanks go to everyone who shared their stories and experiences with us. Thank you so much for your trust.

Contact points:
Support for drug problems in the UK: https://www.mind.org.uk/information-support/types-of-mental-health-problems/recreational-drugs-alcohol-and-addiction/support-for-drug-and-alcohol-problems/
Helpful resources for substance use disorders in the US: https://findtreatment.gov/
NY Office of Addiction Services and Supports: https://oasas.ny.gov/hopeline

Drug Checkings:
Trans-European Drug Information Network (TEDI): https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/6a726e12d751451e8bca49214c141058 
Berlin: https://drugchecking.berlin/ 
Germany-wide testkits: https://www.miraculix-lab.de/ 
Zurich: ht
title: Why Europe Is Addicted to Cocaine
